      • canApprove

        public static boolean canApprove(AmpTeamMember atm,
                                 java.lang.Long activityTeamId,
                                 ApprovalStatus oldApprovalStatus)
        Verifies if the team member can approve an activity from the specified team See setActivityStatus(AmpTeamMember, boolean, AmpActivityFields, AmpActivityVersion, boolean, boolean)
        Parameters:
        atm - the team member to check
        activityTeamId - the team id that activity belongs to that the TM can have the approval right
        oldApprovalStatus - the old approval status
        Returns:
        true if the user is allowed to approve the activity

      • canReject

        public static boolean canReject(AmpTeamMember atm,
                                java.lang.Boolean isDraft,
                                java.lang.Boolean isNewActivity)
        An activity can be rejected only if: 1. the activity is not new 2. the activity is not draft 3. the validation settings is set to on 4. the user is approver of the workspace or is the teamlead of the ws
        Parameters:
        atm -
        isDraft -
        isNewActivity -
        Returns:
